# Healing (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 8th

**Slot** none

**Price** 29,600 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This white ash staff is decorated with inlaid silver runes. It allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Cure Serious Wounds (Spell)|Cure serious wounds]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Restoration, Lesser (Spell)|Lesser restoration]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Remove Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|Remove blindness/deafness]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Remove Disease (Spell)|Remove disease]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Cure Serious Wounds (Spell)|cure serious wounds]], [[Restoration, Lesser (Spell)|lesser restoration]], [[Remove Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|remove blindness/deafness]], [[Remove Disease (Spell)|remove disease]]*

**Cost** 14,800 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 494
